testcase.name: To verify Registration functionality by entering valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened the browser and launched the application..............passed When User enters valid First name...........................................passed And User enters valid Last name.............................................passed And User enters valid Email ID..............................................passed And User enters valid Telephone.............................................passed And User enters valid Password..............................................passed And User enters valid Confirm Password......................................passed And User clicks on radion button no.........................................passed And User clicks on privacy policy checkbox..................................passed And User cliks on continue button...........................................passed Then User should be Registered..............................................passed
